mapper.select: SELECT u.id as "userId", u.nickname as "nickname", u.role_id as "roleId", r.role_name as "roleName", p.menu_code as "menuCode", p.permission_code as "permissionCode" FROM oa_user u LEFT JOIN oa_role r ON r.id = u.role_id LEFT JOIN oa_role_permission rp ON u.role_id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN oa_permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.id AND rp.delete_status = '1' WHERE u.username = #{username} AND u.delete_status = '1'
SELECT p.permission_code as "permissionCode" FROM oa_permission p ORDER BY p.id
SELECT p.menu_code as "menuCode" FROM oa_permission p ORDER BY p.id
